CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to EchoWave?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {below} EchoWave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: Luminara is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {OracleFeed}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {EchoWave}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AetherNet's maximum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AetherNet's maximum Platform Traffic is in {1963}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara's minimum Platform Traffic is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1962, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1957 and 1962?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1958 and 1962 was {lower} than between 1957 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1960, did the total Platform Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1962?
NC.A: The change in total platform traffic between 1957 and 1960 was {smaller} than between 1958 and 1962.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 1957 higher or lower than in 1964?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 1957 was {lower} than in 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1964, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1956 and 1960?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1958 and 1964 was {higher} than between 1956 and 1960.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {OracleFeed} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did OracleFeed and AetherNet first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: OracleFeed and AetherNet first exchanged leading positions in {1959}.
